timerHelp:
§6§lTimer §8| §7Help
§7/timer §8- §7Displays the current time
§7/timer pause §8- §7Pauses the timer
§7/timer resume §8- §7Resumes the timer
§7/timer reset §8- §7Resets the timer
§7/timer set <Seconds> §8- §7Sets the timer to a specific time
§7/timer add <Seconds> §8- §7Increases the timer by a specific time
§7/timer remove <Seconds> §8- §7Decreases the timer by a specific time
§7/timer get §8- §7Displays the current time
§7/timer mode <Countdown/Countup> §8- §7Sets the timer mode
§7/timer setFirstColor <Color> §8- §7Sets the first color
§7/timer setSecondColor <Color> §8- §7Sets the second color
§7/timer bold <true/false> §8- §7Sets the bold value
theFloorIsLavaDescription: Everything beneath you turns to lava after some time.
